response.message:
I think what the CHAOS team has done is great - they've improved lots of sites, and I feel it helped bring the communities closer to the SE headquarters.

Keep up the great work guys!
Would be great to get some of the CHAOS team onto the Travel site - it feels like it's so close to taking off, with momentum building as it is!
Is the trilogy in the sights of CHAOS at all, or are you working exclusively with newer sites?
Judging by the pictures, the CHAOS team are *puts sunglasses on*... tack-full :P hahaha!
Finding individuals out there who are real advocates for a particular topic would be a big benefit. Ideally, they would be on your team and connected to the particualr community.
